messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/12/03 3:51:12 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... And there is frequently no way for you to know that they are molesters. And the likelyood that
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/12/03 3:51:12 PM Eastern Standard Time,
hindar@... writes:

>
> Not an excuse; but it could increase the possiblity that the child may be
> assaulted, or lead to a molester following that child. <big snip> ..
> Molesters are monsters; there is no secret outfit that will
> protect you from them.
>
>
>
And there is frequently no way for you to know that they are molesters. And
the likelyood that you already know one is pretty high. Molesters usually
know their victim. They're not usually lurking around the corner in a
raincoat.

*~*Elissa Jill*~*
unschooling Momma to 3 beautiful brilliant people
Loving partner for life to Joey
terrible guitarist, fair singer and happy woman.
